name: The Solar-Flare Robot
description:
The Solar-Flare Robot

Solar Flares detected. Power systems compromised.

You are The Solar-Flare Robot and have been super-charged by recent Solar Flare activity. You must recharge the drained power-cells around the ship in order to save the ship and the humans on board.

Controls

Movement:  WASD / Arrow Keys / Click-and-drag
Restart: R

Intro text

MESSAGE RECEIVED.

We are in quite a dire situation here.

We're far too close to SOL-34. The solar flares have wiped out all of the ship's power cells. That means oxygen will be offline soon, and gravity, and.. well, everything.

Our scans suggest that you've been affected by the flares too, but you've been given too much power. This is a problem for you, too.

Here is the directive.
One: Travel around the ship and re-charge any power cells you find.
Two: Regularly visit your personal docks for maintenance.
Three: The solar flares are periodic. If you time it right, you'll be able to gain more power from them.

Good luck.

Created for Go Godot Jam 3 Ultra.
Theme: Too Much Power.
